{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Depot Administrator",
  "description": "Tybtitx Services International Limited - Our client, an Agro Allied Company, is recruiting competent and detail-oriented candidates to manage the day-to-day administrative activities at our depot in the capacity below:

Job Position: Depot Administrator

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki / Jakande, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will ensure proper record-keeping, accurate documentation, effective inventory management and smooth coordination between the depot, production, marketing and logistics units.


Requirements


	OND / HND qualification / B.Sc Degree in a related field.
	1 - 2 years of experience in depot, warehouse, or inventory administration.
	Good knowledge of inventory management systems and MS Office (especially Excel).
	Excellent communication, organizational, and reporting skills.
	High level of integrity, attention to detail and ability to work with minimal supervision.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-18",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "name": "Tybtitx Services International Limited"
    
  },

Depot Administrator Job at Tybtitx Services International Limited




        
    

        
        Tybtitx Services International Limited - Our client, an Agro Allied Company, is recruiting competent and detail-oriented candidates to manage the day-to-day administrative activities at our depot in the capacity below:

Job Position: Depot Administrator

Job Location: Lekki / Jakande, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will ensure proper record-keeping, accurate documentation, effective inventory management and smooth coordination between the depot, production, marketing and logistics units.


Requirements
     

            
    




	OND / HND qualification / B.Sc Degree in a related field.
	1 - 2 years of experience in depot, warehouse, or inventory administration.
	Good knowledge of inventory management systems and MS Office (especially Excel).
	Excellent communication, organizational, and reporting skills.
	High level of integrity, attention to detail and ability to work with minimal supervision.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "GIG Logistics is a member of The GIG Group and prides itself as Nigeria&rsquo;s leading logistics company. Incorporated in 2012 and headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria, GIG Logistics leverages on technology to gain competitive advantage.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a highly organized and decent Receptionist to be the first point of contact for our clients and visitors.
	As our receptionist, you will play a vital role in creating a welcoming and professional atmosphere for clients, and managing front desk operations.


Key Responsibilities
Reception &amp; Guest Management:


	Greet and attend to visitors, clients, regulators, and contractors in a professional manner.
	Serve as the first point of contact, representing the company professionally.
	Ensure visitors sign in/out and are directed to the appropriate department.


Communication Handling:


	Manage incoming and outgoing calls, emails, and correspondence.
	Relay messages promptly to the appropriate staff.


Administrative Support:


	Maintain front desk records (visitor log, courier log, etc.).
	Handle incoming and outgoing mail, parcels, and courier services.
	Provide clerical support (typing, photocopying, scanning, filing).


Scheduling &amp; Coordination:


	Assist with meeting room bookings and preparation.
	Support in scheduling appointments and managing calendars.


Customer Service &amp; Representation:


	Handle basic client inquiries and direct complex queries to the appropriate team.


Facility &amp; Office Support:


	Ensure the reception area and front desk are neat, welcoming, and presentable.
	Support administrative team withlogistics coordination when necessary


Qualifications


	OND / HND / Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in any related field.
	Previous receptionist or administrative experience
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
	Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite
	Professional appearance and demeanor
	Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion
	Gender - Female.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to:&nbsp;hr@giglogistics.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-22",

  },

Receptionist Job at GIG Logistics




        
    

        
        GIG Logistics is a member of The GIG Group and prides itself as Nigeria’s leading logistics company. Incorporated in 2012 and headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria, GIG Logistics leverages on technology to gain competitive advantage.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly organized and decent Receptionist to be the first point of contact for our clients and visitors.
	As our receptionist, you will play a vital role in creating a welcoming and professional atmosphere for clients, and managing front desk operations.


Key Responsibilities
Reception & Guest Management:


	Greet and attend to visitors, clients, regulators, and contractors in a professional manner.
	Serve as the first point of contact, representing the company professionally.
	Ensure visitors sign in/out and are directed to the appropriate department.


Communication Handling:


	Manage incoming and outgoing calls, emails, and correspondence.
	Relay messages promptly to the appropriate staff.


Administrative Support:


	Maintain front desk records (visitor log, courier log, etc.).
	Handle incoming and outgoing mail, parcels, and courier services.
	Provide clerical support (typing, photocopying, scanning, filing).


Scheduling & Coordination:


	Assist with meeting room bookings and preparation.
	Support in scheduling appointments and managing calendars.


Customer Service & Representation:


	Handle basic client inquiries and direct complex queries to the appropriate team.


Facility & Office Support:


	Ensure the reception area and front desk are neat, welcoming, and presentable.
	Support administrative team withlogistics coordination when necessary


Qualifications


	OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in any related field.
	Previous receptionist or administrative experience
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
	Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite
	Professional appearance and demeanor
	Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion
	Gender - Female.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: hr@giglogistics.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

            
    




   


    
        Similar Jobs

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Graphics and Motion Designer",
  "description": "Fadac Resources and Services Limited -&nbsp;Our client is a foremost inventory organizer and supplier for small and mid-sized factories to enable their production plant runs effectively without any delays in accessing raw materials.

Due to expansion, they are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Graphics and Motion Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities


	Design and develop visual concepts, graphics, and layouts for marketing materials, including brochures, flyers, posters, and social media posts.
	Create logos, icons, and other graphical elements for the company&#39;s website and marketing materials.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement marketing campaigns.
	Develop and maintain brand consistency across all marketing materials.
	Assist in the design and production of presentations, infographics, and other visual aids.
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in graphic design.


Job Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree
	1 - 3 years of professional experience as a Graphics and/or Motion Designer.
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
	Strong understanding of graphic design principles and best practices
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;clinton.o@fadacresources.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-19",

Graphics and Motion Designer Job at Fadac Resources and Services Limited




        
    

        
        Fadac Resources and Services Limited - Our client is a foremost inventory organizer and supplier for small and mid-sized factories to enable their production plant runs effectively without any delays in accessing raw materials.

Due to expansion, they are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics and Motion Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Design and develop visual concepts, graphics, and layouts for marketing materials, including brochures, flyers, posters, and social media posts.
	Create logos, icons, and other graphical elements for the company's website and marketing materials.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement marketing campaigns.
	Develop and maintain brand consistency across all marketing materials.
	Assist in the design and production of presentations, infographics, and other visual aids.
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in graphic design.


Job Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree
	1 - 3 years of professional experience as a Graphics and/or Motion Designer.
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
	Strong understanding of graphic design principles and best practices
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: clinton.o@fadacresources.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Account Officer",
  "description": "Kindred Path Fertility Centre is a modern fertility and reproductive health facility committed to helping individuals and couples achieve their dream of parenthood. We provide compassionate, confidential and evidence based fertility care using patient centred approaches. Our experience team offers personalized support in a warm and supportive environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Account Officer with at least 2 years of relevant experience to join our team.


Key Responsibilities


	Record daily financial transactions (cash, bank, invoices, payments).
	Maintain accurate entries in the accounting system.
	Prepare monthly management reports.
	Prepare monthly budgets and forecasts.
	Conduct monthly bank reconciliation.
	Prepare statutory schedules and handle remittances.
	Supervise monthly stock-taking and generate reports.
	Organize and file financial documents for easy retrieval.
	Maintain proper documentation of invoices, receipts, and vouchers.
	Manage accounts payables and receivables.


Requirements


	HND/B.Sc. in Accounting or Finance.
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience.
	Basic knowledge of accounting principles.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software (e.g., Zoho Books, Sage, QuickBooks).
	Strong analytical and numerical skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to:&nbsp;hr@kindredpathifm.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Account Officer Job at Kindred Path Fertility Centre




        
    

        
        Kindred Path Fertility Centre is a modern fertility and reproductive health facility committed to helping individuals and couples achieve their dream of parenthood. We provide compassionate, confidential and evidence based fertility care using patient centred approaches. Our experience team offers personalized support in a warm and supportive environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Account Officer with at least 2 years of relevant experience to join our team.


Key Responsibilities


	Record daily financial transactions (cash, bank, invoices, payments).
	Maintain accurate entries in the accounting system.
	Prepare monthly management reports.
	Prepare monthly budgets and forecasts.
	Conduct monthly bank reconciliation.
	Prepare statutory schedules and handle remittances.
	Supervise monthly stock-taking and generate reports.
	Organize and file financial documents for easy retrieval.
	Maintain proper documentation of invoices, receipts, and vouchers.
	Manage accounts payables and receivables.


Requirements


	HND/B.Sc. in Accounting or Finance.
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience.
	Basic knowledge of accounting principles.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software (e.g., Zoho Books, Sage, QuickBooks).
	Strong analytical and numerical skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: hr@kindredpathifm.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Supermarket Manager",
  "description": "Domeo Resources International (DRI) is a prolific organisation which proffers HR and Management Consultancy solutions premised on excellence and innovation. DRI analyses various organisational problems, develops improvement plans, deploys those plans and monitors the plans to ensure improved organisational performance.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Jabi, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary


	The Supermarket Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the store, ensuring excellent customer service, driving sales, maintaining inventory accuracy, supervising staff, and ensuring the supermarket runs efficiently and profitably.
	The role requires strong leadership, problem-solving abilities, and operational expertise.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day supermarket operations.
	Manage and supervise staff including cashiers, floor attendants, and inventory personnel.
	Ensure excellent customer service and handle customer complaints professionally.
	Monitor inventory levels, place orders, and ensure timely restocking of shelves.
	Maintain store cleanliness, safety, and compliance with company standards.
	Prepare daily/weekly sales reports and analyze performance indicators.
	Implement promotional activities and ensure product displays are attractive.
	Train, coach, and motivate team members to meet performance targets.
	Ensure adherence to cash-handling procedures and financial controls.
	Coordinate with suppliers and ensure timely delivery of goods.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Minimum of OND / HND / BSc in any related field.
	2&ndash;5 years of experience in supermarket management or a supervisory retail role.
	Experience handling fast-paced retail operations is an added advantage.


Technical Skills:


	Inventory Management: Ability to monitor stock levels, identify shortages, manage expiries, and coordinate reorders.
	Sales &amp; Reporting: Proficiency in daily/weekly sales reporting, analyzing sales trends, and preparing performance summaries.
	POS &amp; Retail Systems: Understanding of supermarket POS systems, cash-handling procedures, and reconciliation.
	Supplier &amp; Vendor Management: Ability to manage suppliers, negotiate prices, and track deliveries.
	Store Operations Knowledge: Knowledge of merchandising, shelf arrangement, product categorization, and store layout improvement.
	Financial Knowledge: Basic understanding of budgeting, cost control, shrinkage reduction, and profit optimization.
	Compliance &amp; Safety: Familiarity with workplace safety standards, hygiene practices, and regulatory requirements.


Soft Skills:


	Leadership &amp; Team Management: Ability to supervise, motivate, and guide staff effectively.
	Communication Skills: Clear verbal and written communication for dealing with customers, staff, and suppliers.
	Customer Service Orientation: Strong focus on addressing customer needs and resolving issues professionally.
	Problem-Solving: Ability to think quickly and handle operational challenges efficiently.
	Time Management: Ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple activities simultaneously.
	Attention to Detail: Ensures accuracy in stock counts, pricing, display arrangement, and reporting.
	Decision-Making: Ability to make sound, timely decisions in fast-paced situations.
	Adaptability: Ability to work in a dynamic environment and adjust to operational changes or emergencies.
	Teamwork: Works well with teams and fosters a positive work environment.
	Stress Management: Able to work under pressure, especially during peak periods.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CVs and Cover Letters to:&nbsp;recruitment@domeoresources.org&nbsp;using &quot;Supermarket Manager -Abuja&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note


	Only for people within jabi and it&#39;s environ
	Only people within Jabi and it&#39;s environ should apply
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Supermarket Manager Job at Domeo Resources International




        
    

        
        Domeo Resources International (DRI) is a prolific organisation which proffers HR and Management Consultancy solutions premised on excellence and innovation. DRI analyses various organisational problems, develops improvement plans, deploys those plans and monitors the plans to ensure improved organisational performance.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Manager

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary
     

            
    




	The Supermarket Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the store, ensuring excellent customer service, driving sales, maintaining inventory accuracy, supervising staff, and ensuring the supermarket runs efficiently and profitably.
	The role requires strong leadership, problem-solving abilities, and operational expertise.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day supermarket operations.
	Manage and supervise staff including cashiers, floor attendants, and inventory personnel.
	Ensure excellent customer service and handle customer complaints professionally.
	Monitor inventory levels, place orders, and ensure timely restocking of shelves.
	Maintain store cleanliness, safety, and compliance with company standards.
	Prepare daily/weekly sales reports and analyze performance indicators.
	Implement promotional activities and ensure product displays are attractive.
	Train, coach, and motivate team members to meet performance targets.
	Ensure adherence to cash-handling procedures and financial controls.
	Coordinate with suppliers and ensure timely delivery of goods.


Qualifications & Experience


	Minimum of OND / HND / BSc in any related field.
	2–5 years of experience in supermarket management or a supervisory retail role.
	Experience handling fast-paced retail operations is an added advantage.


Technical Skills:


	Inventory Management: Ability to monitor stock levels, identify shortages, manage expiries, and coordinate reorders.
	Sales & Reporting: Proficiency in daily/weekly sales reporting, analyzing sales trends, and preparing performance summaries.
	POS & Retail Systems: Understanding of supermarket POS systems, cash-handling procedures, and reconciliation.
	Supplier & Vendor Management: Ability to manage suppliers, negotiate prices, and track deliveries.
	Store Operations Knowledge: Knowledge of merchandising, shelf arrangement, product categorization, and store layout improvement.
	Financial Knowledge: Basic understanding of budgeting, cost control, shrinkage reduction, and profit optimization.
	Compliance & Safety: Familiarity with workplace safety standards, hygiene practices, and regulatory requirements.


Soft Skills:


	Leadership & Team Management: Ability to supervise, motivate, and guide staff effectively.
	Communication Skills: Clear verbal and written communication for dealing with customers, staff, and suppliers.
	Customer Service Orientation: Strong focus on addressing customer needs and resolving issues professionally.
	Problem-Solving: Ability to think quickly and handle operational challenges efficiently.
	Time Management: Ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple activities simultaneously.
	Attention to Detail: Ensures accuracy in stock counts, pricing, display arrangement, and reporting.
	Decision-Making: Ability to make sound, timely decisions in fast-paced situations.
	Adaptability: Ability to work in a dynamic environment and adjust to operational changes or emergencies.
	Teamwork: Works well with teams and fosters a positive work environment.
	Stress Management: Able to work under pressure, especially during peak periods.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CVs and Cover Letters to: recruitment@domeoresources.org using "Supermarket Manager -Abuja" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Only for people within jabi and it's environ
	Only people within Jabi and it's environ should apply
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
